name: Dice Splice
description:
A game made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022 about the theme "Roll of the Dice".

Dice Splice is a puzzle game where you have to match dice with their respective numbers.

Controls:

Arrow Keys / WASD
Moves dice
Q, E
Rotates camera
Left Shift
Uncovers objectives
RResets current level
